persona_table.Key_Traits: Lower income, highest children count, low spend & frequency, store-heavy, deal-dependent
persona_table.Business_Action: Value packs, coupons, in-store promotions, discount-led messaging

persona_table.Key_Traits: Highest income, highest spend & frequency, high product variety, low deal dependency
persona_table.Business_Action: Premium offers, loyalty rewards, exclusives, avoid heavy discounts

persona_table.Key_Traits: Very low income, near-zero purchases, extremely deal-dependent, tiny segment
persona_table.Business_Action: Exclude from core campaigns; handle separately if needed

persona_table.Key_Traits: Mid income, moderate children, steady purchases, balanced channels, moderate promo sensitivity
persona_table.Business_Action: Bundles, seasonal campaigns, cross-sell, family-oriented messaging
